node.subTitle: How machine knit yarn sizes differ from hand knit yarn sizes
node.title: Machine Knit Yarn Sizing

content.value: Understanding yarn size is a requirement when planning a new garment. Machine knit yarn sizes and hand knit yarn sizes have their own system of measurement.

node.subTitle: Choosing between a used Brother Knitting Machine and a new Silver Reed
node.title: Comparing Knitting Machines

content.value: There are a few major knitting machine brands to choose from. Based on the machines my dealer had available, I narrowed my search down to a used Brother kh-965 and a new Silver Reed SK 840 Electronic Standard Gauge.
